To play MP with bots:
-Open console (pres ` button) and type "map and mape name) example "map mp_ville"

To add more bots:
open folder Call of Duty - Black Opsplayers   ,open file  config_mp.cfg with wordpad ,find lines
seta scr_bots_managed_all "10"
seta scr_bots_managed_spawn "10"

To change your name:
open folder Call of Duty - Black Opsplayers   ,open file  config_mp.cfg with wordpad ,find line
